title: Best of the Program | Guest: Sasha Stone | 9/19/22
description:
Glenn debunks President Biden's misleading statements on inflation during his "60 Minutes" special and warns of the coming economic crisis already forming overseas. Glenn talks to Sasha Stone, a lifelong Democrat who campaigned for Joe Biden, as she shares why she no longer supports the current president.
